name: Bullet 'em Hell Up
description:
In 2073 a great nation discovered the entrance to Hell, in order to prevent catastrophic events a national organization called A.N.A.L sent you to a death quest to elliminating the most demons you're able to.

Night Furry

U know that none furry will go to heaven, so they go to hell ad become those things that try to grab everything that looks different.

Dick Mouth

I rather not comment on that one.

Monkyo

Every r4c1st that goes to hell became this guy.

Stoner Bishop

During black plague time, this Bishop used to smoke pot and spread the plage while stoned.

Ratter

Just a rat contaminated by the black plague.

Succubus

When she was alive, she used to be a e-girl streamer that has a onlyfans account.

????

???????????

how do you think the entrance to hell is?

If you read until here, thank you, hope u enjoyed your time appreciating my madness and hope u can help me finnanciate this project along the way.

If you buy it now you'll be able to download an APK with no ADS. But remember this is a prototype, it have a few bugs and hopefully you can tell me what you think and what I can improve.

Thank you!
